name: Noble Oath
loreDescription: An emblem given to members of Ezera's Orders after they pledge to dedicate their lives to the Goddess. Those given to knights resemble an escutcheon, while those given to priests resemble a rosary.

skillDescription.base: As Health decreases, Defense and Effect Resistance increase by up to 25.0%.
skillDescription.max: As Health decreases, Defense and Effect Resistance increase by up to 50.0%.
